title: MAXI/GSC Unknown Source Position
description: MAXI Unknown Source Position. GRB or unknown X-ray Transient.

circle_error_radius.description: Radius of the 90% confidence level statistical error circle, in degrees.

elliptical_error_radii.description: Semi-major and semi-minor axes of the 90% confidence level statistical error ellipse, in degrees.

elliptical_error_roll.description: Position angle of the semi-major axis of the error ellipse, measured counterclockwise from celestial north, in degrees.

rectangular_error_corners.description: Coordinates of the four corners of the rectangular error box. Each item is a [RA, Dec] pair in degrees

event_flux.description: X-ray flux of the event in mCrab

event_flux_error.description: Error of the X-ray flux of the event in mCrab

event_tscale.description: Detection time scale of the event

event_eband.description: Energy range for the event detection (in keV)

sun_position.description: Equatorial coordinates of the Sun (RA, Dec) in degrees

sun_distance.description: Angular distance between the source and the Sun (in degrees)

moon_position.description: Equatorial coordinates of the Moon (RA, Dec) in degrees

moon_distance.description: Angular distance between the source and the Moon (in degrees)

moon_illumination.description: Illuminated fraction of the Moon's surface, in percent.

galactic_coords.description: Galactic longitude and latitude of the burst or transient event (in degrees)

ecliptic_coords.description: Ecliptic longitude and latitude of the burst or transient event (in degrees)
